title: The Haunted Manor
description: Investigate the abandoned Blackwood Manor and uncover its dark secrets.

public_embed.title: üèöÔ∏è Blackwood Manor
public_embed.description:
The old manor looms ahead, its broken windows staring down at you like hollow eyes. Locals say no one who enters after midnight ever comes back the same.

You check your watch ‚Äî 11:47 PM. The iron gates creak in the wind, almost like they're inviting you in.

Your investigation starts now.
public_embed.caption: The manor calls to you...

fields.name: Your Mission
fields.value: Find out what happened to the Blackwood family and survive the night.

public_embed.title: üö™ The Entrance
public_embed.description:
You stand at the manor's front. The main door has a massive brass knocker shaped like a lion's head. To your left, a side window sits slightly ajar.

How do you want to get in?
public_embed.footer: Choose wisely ‚Äî each path has its own dangers.

public_embed.title: ‚è±Ô∏è The Lion's Mouth
public_embed.description:
You grab the knocker and strike it three times. The sound echoes through the manor.

Suddenly, the door begins to shimmer and fade ‚Äî it's disappearing! You need to get through before it vanishes completely!

public_embed.title: üí® Gone
public_embed.description: The door vanishes completely, leaving only solid brick. Guess you're taking the window route after all.

public_embed.title: üîê The Rusted Lock
public_embed.description:
The window has an old mechanical lock with three levers. Each lever is marked with a symbol: a Moon, a Star, and a Sun.

A faded inscription reads:
*"First the night must fall, then hope appears, finally the day begins."*

fields.name: Hint
fields.value: Pull the levers in the order described by the riddle.

public_embed.title: ‚ùå Stuck!
public_embed.description: The mechanism jams from too many wrong attempts. You force it open with a loud crash ‚Äî not exactly subtle, but you're in.

public_embed.title: üèõÔ∏è The Grand Hall
public_embed.description:
You stumble into a massive hall. Moonlight streams through broken skylights, illuminating dusty portraits of the Blackwood family.

Their painted eyes seem to follow your every move.

A corridor leads deeper into the manor, toward what looks like the library.

public_embed.title: üìö Blackwood Library
public_embed.description:
Towering bookshelves reach to the ceiling, filled with leather-bound tomes covered in thick dust. A fire crackles in the hearth ‚Äî strange, since no one has lived here for decades.

Then you see her.

A translucent woman in a Victorian dress stands by the fireplace, her hollow gaze locked onto you.
public_embed.caption: You are not alone.

public_embed.title: üëª Lady Blackwood
public_embed.description:
The ghost floats toward you, her voice like wind through broken glass:

*"Another soul seeks answers... or another victim for my collection?"*

How do you respond?

approaches.label: I want to help you find peace
I mean no disrespect, my lady

public_embed.title: ‚ú® A Moment of Clarity
public_embed.description:
Lady Blackwood's expression softens. For a moment, she almost looks human again.

*"You... you remind me of my daughter. Perhaps you truly can end this curse."*

She gestures toward a hidden panel behind the bookshelf.

*"The answers you seek lie below. But beware ‚Äî my husband's spirit guards the ritual room, and he was never as forgiving as I."*

public_embed.title: ü§î Not Convinced
public_embed.description:
Lady Blackwood tilts her head, studying you.

*"Pretty words... but I've heard many promises over the years. Prove your worth."*

She vanishes, but a cold draft pushes a bookshelf aside, revealing a hidden passage.

public_embed.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Spectral Fury
public_embed.description:
Lady Blackwood's form twists into something monstrous. Her scream shatters the windows as she lunges at you!

*"YOU DARE COMMAND ME?!"*

public_embed.title: üí´ Rest Now
public_embed.description:
Lady Blackwood's form flickers and fades. Her last words are a whisper:

*"Perhaps... you are the one... the passage... behind the books..."*

She dissolves into mist, leaving the hidden passage exposed.

public_embed.title: üòµ Too Strong
public_embed.description:
The ghost's fury is overwhelming. You black out...

When you wake, you're lying in a dark corridor. The spirit is gone, but she clearly wanted you to find something. A passage stands open behind you.

public_embed.title: üï≥Ô∏è The Secret Passage
public_embed.description:
A spiral staircase descends into darkness. Ancient symbols line the walls ‚Äî they look important.

Those with keen eyes might notice something others miss...
public_embed.footer: Check your DMs if you have the Scout role.

content.text:
üîç **Scout Intel**

You notice four symbols repeating on the walls: **Triangle, Circle, Square, Star**

An inscription reads: *"The shape of the soul, the cycle of life, the foundation of earth, and the light of hope."*

This might be the answer to something ahead!

public_embed.title: üîÆ The Ritual Room
public_embed.description:
You enter a circular chamber lit by flickering candles. In the center, a stone altar bears four carved slots.

A spectral voice echoes:

*"Only those who remember may proceed. What shape represents the soul?"*
public_embed.caption: What shape is the soul?

fields.name: Challenge
fields.value: Think back to the symbols you saw ‚Äî or ask your scout!

memory.question: What shape represents the soul according to the inscription?
hints: It points upward like a soul ascending

public_embed.title: ‚ú® Correct!
public_embed.description:
The altar glows as the correct symbol slides into place. A hidden door grinds open, revealing the final chamber.

You can feel an immense energy beyond ‚Äî this is where it all ends.

public_embed.title: ‚ùå Wrong Answer
public_embed.description:
The altar flashes red. Wrong symbol.

The door still opens ‚Äî but you've triggered a ward. You'll face what's ahead at a disadvantage.

public_embed.title: ‚ö° Lord Blackwood
public_embed.description:
The final chamber contains the twisted spirit of Lord Blackwood himself. His form crackles with dark energy as ancient chains bind him to a massive ritual circle.

*"So... you've come to end it. Choose your method, mortal."*

You see two options: fight him directly, or attempt the banishment ritual carved into the floor.
public_embed.caption: Choose your method, mortal.

fields.name: Warning
fields.value: This choice will determine your ending.

public_embed.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Lord Blackwood Unleashed
public_embed.description:
Lord Blackwood breaks his chains with a thunderous roar. His form expands into a towering shade of pure malice.

*"FOOL! I WILL ADD YOUR SOUL TO MY COLLECTION!"*

fields.name: Objective
fields.value: Destroy Lord Blackwood's spirit once and for all!

public_embed.title: üîÆ The Ritual
public_embed.description:
You begin tracing the ritual circle's patterns. Four steps must be completed in perfect order:

*"Salt the threshold, speak the name, light the flame, seal the shame."*

Lord Blackwood screams as you begin, trying to break your concentration!

fields.name: Instructions
fields.value: Complete the ritual steps in the correct order!

public_embed.title: ‚öîÔ∏è Vanquished!
public_embed.description:
With one final strike, Lord Blackwood's form shatters into a thousand fragments of light. His anguished scream fades into silence.

The manor shudders. The curse is broken through sheer force of will.

You did it the hard way ‚Äî but you did it.

public_embed.title: ‚ú® Banished!
public_embed.description:
The ritual circle blazes with holy light as you complete the final step. Lord Blackwood's spirit is pulled toward the center, his screams fading as he's dragged into oblivion.

*"No... NOOOOO‚Äî"*

Silence. The curse is truly broken, and every soul trapped here can finally rest.

public_embed.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Almost...
public_embed.description:
You fumble the ritual sequence. The circle flickers but doesn't fully activate.

Lord Blackwood laughs, but his form is weakened. He can't maintain his power anymore.

*"This isn't over... but it seems I must sleep again..."*

He fades away. The curse is suppressed, but not destroyed. Someone else might have to finish what you started.

public_embed.title: üíÄ Your End
public_embed.description:
Lord Blackwood's power is too great. Your vision fades as cold darkness envelops you.

*"Another soul for my collection..."*

When dawn comes, another portrait hangs in the grand hall. Yours.

The curse continues.

public_embed.title: üíÄ GAME OVER
public_embed.description:
Your investigation ended in tragedy. Perhaps someone else will succeed where you failed...

*Or perhaps they'll join your portrait on the wall.*
public_embed.footer: Thanks for playing The Haunted Manor!

public_embed.title: üåÖ A New Dawn
public_embed.description:
You emerge from the manor as the first rays of sunlight break over the horizon. Behind you, the building looks less menacing now ‚Äî just an old house, finally at peace.

The Blackwood family can rest. And you survived to tell the tale.

Maybe next time, you'll think twice before investigating haunted houses at midnight.
public_embed.caption: The nightmare is over.
public_embed.footer: üéâ Congratulations! You completed The Haunted Manor!
